pkgmetadata.longdescription: GNOME Shell provides core user interface functions for the GNOME 3 desktop, like switching to windows and launching applications. GNOME Shell takes advantage of the capabilities of modern graphics hardware and introduces innovative user interface concepts to provide a visually attractive and easy to use experience.

use.flag: Ensure the presence of extensions.gnome.org native connector gnome-extra/gnome-browser-connector
Use sys-auth/elogind for session tracking and suspend support.
Enable support for enhanced input methods through app-i18n/ibus
Ensure presence of telepathy chat integration
